data.actual_result: The spacing between the "Listening Along" and the "Voice Connected" box is larger than the "Voice Connected" and the user info box.
data.expected_result: Spacing between the boxes should be the same.
data.short_description: Spacing between "Listening Along", "Voice Connected" and user info is not similar.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a voice chat and a listening party at the same time - Observe the spacing between the different boxes
